sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>This fix script will run once to update the default value for pa_indicators.role_override to false for upgrading customers.</description>
        <name>Set role_override default value to false</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.log("Fix Script: Set role_override default value to false - started");
var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
gr.addQuery('name', 'pa_indicators');
gr.addQuery('element', 'role_override');
gr.addQuery('default_value', true);
gr.query();
if (gr.next()) {
	gr.setValue('default_value', false);
	gr.update();
}
gs.log("Fix Script: Set role_override default value to false - ended");]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-07-06 13:18:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>d8a89d923b315010ba51ac20e2efc462</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Set role_override default value to false</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Performance Analytics" source="com.snc.pa">4069fc643cf1311068bcf327dfe37fe4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_d8a89d923b315010ba51ac20e2efc462</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-07-06 13:28:17</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Set role_override default value to false
